long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
lines off lets you turn off borders and lines on web pages. This might be pleasant for reading or printing. 

You can run lines off on single pages or activate it for every page. On pages with an intricate user interface (e.g. Google Docs) you might need to deactivate it again for the page to work as expected.
